TopBar.tooltip: 译者汪志成的博客，包括翻译文章和原创文章

SideNav.title: Introduction
SideNav.tooltipCn: 欢迎使用 Angular 文档集。
SideNav.tooltip: Welcome to the Angular documentation set.

SideNav.title: Getting Started
SideNav.tooltipCn: 设置你的环境并学习基本概念
SideNav.tooltip: Set up your environment and learn basic concepts

children.title: What is Angular?
children.tooltipCn: Angular 平台的简要描述。
children.tooltip: A brief description of the Angular platform.

children.title: Try it
children.tooltipCn: 检查和使用现成的示例应用，无需设置。
children.tooltip: Examine and work with a ready-made sample app, with no setup.

children.title: Getting started
children.tooltipCn: 看看 Angular 的组件模型、模板语法和组件通信。
children.tooltip: Take a look at Angular's component model, template syntax, and component communication.

children.title: Adding navigation
children.tooltipCn: 使用浏览器的 URL 在不同的页面视图之间导航。
children.tooltip: Navigate among different page views using the browser's URL.

children.title: Managing Data
children.tooltipCn: 通过 HTTP 使用服务和访问外部数据。
children.tooltip: Use services and access external data via HTTP.

children.titleCn: 使用表单进行用户输入
children.title: Using Forms for User Input
children.tooltipCn: 了解如何使用表单从用户那里获取和管理数据。
children.tooltip: Learn about fetching and managing data from users with forms.

children.title: Deploying an application
children.tooltipCn: 转向本地开发，或将你的应用部署到 Firebase 或你自己的服务器。
children.tooltip: Move to local development, or deploy your application to Firebase or your own server.

children.title: Setup
children.tooltipCn: 使用 Angular CLI 搭建本地开发环境。
children.tooltip: Setting up for local development with the Angular CLI.

SideNav.title: Understanding Angular
SideNav.tooltipCn: 学习成为熟练 Angular 开发人员的必备概念。
SideNav.tooltip: Learn the essential concepts to become a proficient Angular developer.

children.title: Overview
children.tooltipCn: 学习 Angular 应用中最常用的部分。
children.tooltip: Learn about the most common parts of an Angular application.

children.title: Components

children.tooltip: Learn more about how to use data binding to build dynamic views

children.title: Overview
children.tooltipCn: 如何创建 Angular 组件的概述。
children.tooltip: Overview of how to create Angular components.

children.title: Component Lifecycle
children.tooltipCn: Angular 在创建、更改和销毁指令和组件时调用的一些生命周期钩子方法。
children.tooltip: Angular calls lifecycle hook methods on directives and components as it creates, changes, and destroys them.

children.title: View Encapsulation
children.tooltipCn: 描述如何将组件 CSS 样式封装到组件的视图中。
children.tooltip: Describes how component CSS styles are encapsulated into a component's view.

children.title: Component Interaction

children.title: Component Styles
children.tooltipCn: 添加专属于某个组件的 CSS 样式。

children.titleCn: 在父子组件、指令之间共享数据

children.tooltip: Introductory guide to sharing data between parent and child directives or components.

children.title: Content Projection

children.title: Dynamic Components

children.title: Angular Elements

children.title: Templates

children.tooltipCn: 模板简介
children.tooltip: Introduction to templates.

children.title: Template reference variables

children.tooltip: Introductory guide to referring to DOM elements within a template.

children.title: SVG as templates
children.tooltipCn: 了解如何使用 SVG 作为 Angular 应用的模板。

children.title: Directives

children.tooltipCn: 属性型指令将行为附加到元素。

children.title: Structural Directives

children.tooltip: Structural directives manipulate the layout of the page.

children.title: Angular Dependency Injection
children.tooltipCn: Angular 的依赖注入系统能够为 Angular 创建的类创建并交付它们所依赖的服务。
children.tooltip: Angular's dependency injection system creates and delivers dependent services to Angular-created classes.

children.title: DI Providers
children.tooltipCn: 关于不同类型的提供者的更多信息。
